# removeDeliveredNotification(_:)

**Instance Method**

Remove a delivered user notification from the user notification center.

## Declaration

```swift
func removeDeliveredNotification(_ notification: NSUserNotification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: The user notification.

## Discussion

If the user notification is not in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserNotificationCenter/deliveredNotifications], nothing happens.

## Managing the Delivered Notifications

- **deliver(_:)**: Deliver the specified user notification.
- **deliveredNotifications**: An array of all user notifications delivered to the notification center.
- **removeAllDeliveredNotifications()**: Remove all delivered user notifications from the user notification center.
